text:
20036
July 22, 1963
Mr. Dean Gregory
Apartment 2H, International House
500 Riverside Drive
New York 27, New York
Dear Dean:
We need to have you complete the enclosed form indicating that you
are not a resident in the District of Columbia. If you can get it back
to us within the next few days, this will keep our accounting office
happy.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
